name: Lonely In Space (ShunPeng1)
description:
Welcome to Lonely In Space, This is a story about a robot name HAL 9000, who is living in an abandoned spaceship flooting to nowhere. All of his crewmates died from starvation. Help him redirect lazer beam to the core with the hope to power the engine and return home !

This game is a submission for Mini Jam 124 : Warmth . You can visit it here https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-124-warmth

Controls

  • Drag and Drop Mirror : to from the Item slot or on its sprite to move to the  position
  • Press Digital Number  : to exchange the number of mirror and the digital number.
  • Direct the Lazer with Mirror: to hit the Collectibles and Goals

Credit to Game Asset creator :

  • UI : https://sungraphica.itch.io/sci-fi-game-ui-collection-free-version
  • Sound Track : https://davidkbd.itch.io/pink-bloom-synthwave-music-pack
  • Sound Effect : https://gamesupply.itch.io/300-futuristic-sfx-with-names
  • Sprite : https://gamesupply.itch.io/great-space-strategy-asset
  • Tileset : https://jonik9i.itch.io/free-space-station-game-asset
